title: [K-12] Culture-Based Science Education Design: Intermediate Course Utilizing Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: A course applying Culture-Based Models (CBM) to design science content reflecting multicultural elements, with VR simulations for constructing and evaluating real educational environments

learning_goals: Learners can design science education scenarios incorporating cultural elements using the CBM framework
Learners can develop science experiment modules considering multicultural contexts using VR simulation tools
Learners can write formative assessment reports analyzing the effectiveness of culture-based instructional design through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
